name: Acid
description: You create a stream of hot acid in a 30 foot cone, centered on you. Creatures caught in the cone must make on a DEX save, taking 1d6 + MOVE poison damage on a fail, and half as much on a success.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Brings down the energy of any Pokemon that have already used a move this turn.
